projects.title: Book Tracker
projects.description: This is a projects that displays a library of books based on different shelves. there are three (3) shelves in this project which are (currently reading, want to read and read). Books can be moved from one shelfto the other. We can also perform a search to look for books to add to our shelves.

projects.title: Shopper
projects.description: This is a single webpage designed with HTML and Bootstrap

projects.title: Buildings sorter
projects.description: This was built with material-UI and react. It displays a table of cities, structures etc. This Table can also be sorted, To order by City, add ?orderByField=city to the base url and the table would be sorted by city, You can also change city to any other column and it will be sorted using that particular column as a parameter.
